readingMnemonic: As if things couldn't get worse, your relative seems to think they're <reading>sexy</reading> (せき) when they're on the slide drunk. Sexy? More like irresponsible!
meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>slide</radical> with a <radical>drunkard</radical> <radical>above</radical> it, and they're making you feel <radical>small</radical>. And the worst part is that the drunkard is one of your <kanji>relatives</kanji>.
